name: John Roeszler
bio:
ROESZLER In memory of Elizabeth
wife of John Roeszler
died Sept. 9 , 1918
in her 61 st year

died May 17, 1946
in his 91 st year

1898-1984

1886-1933

1899-1900

1884-1959
his wife Rosina Roeszler
1883-1963

1917-1990
his wife
Nita Mae Riley
1926-1992
